Articles.Content: Hey I am having problems with the stack decouplers that I built, I followed http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25013?p=457260&posted=1#post457260.
And I have solutions, but in order to see them you'll have to be a lot less restrained in your divulgence of information relating to your problems.

Hey I am having problems with the stack decouplers that I built, I followed http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25013?p=457260&posted=1#post457260.

Maybe it would help if you told us what problems you are having exactly Without specifics it becomes really hard to help you out.
